member.name: T:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks
member.summary: Basic links module

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.mdfItemTableName
member.summary: The name of the core item table for the module.

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.mdfTitleFieldName
member.summary: The name of the field in the core item table that is considered the item title. Typical value is "Title".

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.mdfSelectFieldList
member.summary: The list of fields in the SQL select. Please separate with comma and prefix with "itm.". You can get this list from the sproc GetXXXX that feeds data to this module.

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.mdfSortFieldList
member.summary: All fields from the core item table you want to sort on.

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.mdfDefaultSortField
member.summary: A single field from mdfSortFieldList.

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.mdfSearchFieldList
member.summary: Fields to search - must be nvarchar or ntext type.

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.myDataList
member.summary: Datalist of links

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.linkImage
member.summary: link image

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.linkTextKey
member.summary: link text

member.name: F:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.linkAlternateText
member.summary: link tooltip

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event handler on this User Control is used to obtain a DataReader of link information from the Links table, and then databind the results to a templated DataList server control. It uses the Rainbow.LinkDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinks.SearchSqlSelect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Searchable module implementation
member.param: ID of the user is searching
The fields where perfoming the search
member.returns: The SELECT sql to perform a search on the current module

member.summary: Raises Init event

member.summary: Install

member.summary: Searchable module

member.name: T:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinkDB
member.summary: Class that encapsulates all data logic necessary to add/query/delete links within the Portal database.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinkDB.GetLinks(System.Int32,Rainbow.Framework.Site.Configuration.Rainbow.Framework.WorkFlowVersion)
member.summary: The GetLinks method returns a SqlDataReader containing all of the links for a specific portal module from the announcements database.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinkDB.GetSingleLink(System.Int32,Rainbow.Framework.Site.Configuration.Rainbow.Framework.WorkFlowVersion)
member.summary: The GetSingleLink method returns a SqlDataReader containing details about a specific link from the Links database table.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinkDB.DeleteLink(System.Int32)
member.summary: The DeleteLink method deletes a specified link from the Links database table.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinkDB.AddLink(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The AddLink method adds a new link within the links database table, and returns ItemID value as a result.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinkDB.UpdateLink(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The UpdateLink method updates a specified link within the Links database table.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinksEdit.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event on this Page is used to obtain the ItemID of the link to edit. It then uses the Rainbow.LinkDB() data component to populate the page's edit controls with the links details.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinksEdit.OnUpdate(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The UpdateBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to either create or update a link. It uses the Rainbow.LinkDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinksEdit.OnDelete(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The DeleteBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to delete a link. It uses the Rainbow.LinksDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinksEdit.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises OnInitEvent

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinksEdit.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: P:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesLinksEdit.AllowedModules
member.summary: Set the module guids with free access to this page
